t: Amazon has their very own wine brand | BobIsTheOilGuy
s: It's called Cursive and the vineyards are in New Mexico, of all places. We bought a few bottles of the sparkling brut locally for a mere $5.99 a bottle and it isn't bad. You would never confuse it with something French or even a Cava, but it is an okay wine, pleasantly dry although pretty light...
